item.title: Repost from IvyPatdu https://twitter.com/IvyPatdu/statuses/757550138734747649/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from IvyPatdu https://twitter.com/IvyPatdu/statuses/757550138734747649/:

The proposed IRR of the DPA specifically says, the Act shall not be used to restrict access to matters of public concern. (Sec. 5a) #FOI

item.title: Repost from IvyPatdu https://twitter.com/IvyPatdu/statuses/757549923663351809/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from IvyPatdu https://twitter.com/IvyPatdu/statuses/757549923663351809/:

The Data Privacy Act makes it clear that information about a government official in relation to position/function is not covered. #FOI
